---
title: "tokenproof and Unlock Labs Bring Events Onchain Together"
subtitle: ""
authorName: "Unlock Labs team"
publishDate: "Wed May 08 2024 00:00:00 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)"
description: "You can now check-in onchain tickets powered by Unlock Protocol with the tokenproof verifier app."
image: "/images/blog/tokenproof-and-unlock-labs-bring-events-onchain-together/c57b6b2cbf9309a93484633b4559070d.jpg"
---

![tokenproof and Unlock Labs Bring Events Onchain Together](https://storage.googleapis.com/papyrus_images/c57b6b2cbf9309a93484633b4559070d.jpg)

<p>Tokenproof is a suite of tools for verifying possession of a digital asset without exposing that asset itself. It allows users to prove ownership of NFTs and other tokens online and at real-world events without exposing their actual tokens to third parties, by connecting their onchain account with a mobile device through the <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://tokenproof.xyz/"><strong>tokenproof</strong></a> app.</p><p>One of the incredibly powerful aspects of building onchain is the benefit of “composability” — the ability for open, standards-based approaches to “just work” together. The ability to use a tokenproof verifier with an Unlock Protocol ticket, membership, or subscription is an example of just that. With a minimum of configuration, the two systems just work together.</p><p>You can now set up a tokenproof verifier to check in tickets for an Unlock-powered event ticket.</p><p>Here's how to do it.</p><div class="relative header-and-anchor"><h2 style="text-align: start" id="h-set-up-your-event-with-events-by-unlock-labs"><strong>Set up your event with EVENTS by Unlock Labs</strong></h2></div><p style="text-align: start">First, set up your event ticket and landing page. (It should take less than five minutes to set up your event.) There is a full guide here on <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://unlock-protocol.com/guides/how-to-sell-nft-tickets-for-an-event/"><strong>how to set up an onchain event</strong></a>.</p><img src="/images/blog/tokenproof-and-unlock-labs-bring-events-onchain-together/29d1080a9bf74782657d963c42454f65.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="1296" nextwidth="2048" class="image-node embed"><p>In the event landing page above, notice the link in the ticketing area of the landing page, shown by the red arrow. That link will show the details of the smart contract that is associated with this particular onchain ticket.</p><p>Click that link, which will open up a block explorer with additional details about the smart contract for the onchain ticket. Most notably, you’re going to need the “contract address” of this onchain ticket in order to let tokenproof know what token to look for in attendee’s wallets for checkin at the venue.</p><figure float="none" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: null;"><img src="/images/blog/tokenproof-and-unlock-labs-bring-events-onchain-together/3f3be94edc654fbee78f86c77bf5b4e3.png" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure><p>Copy the smart contract address.</p><div class="relative header-and-anchor"><h2 style="text-align: start" id="h-next-set-up-tokenproof"><strong>Next, set up tokenproof</strong></h2></div><p style="text-align: start">The individuals you have verifying onchain tickets at the door can use the tokenproof app.</p><p style="text-align: start">As the event organizer, go to <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://portal.tokenproof.xyz"><strong>https://portal.tokenproof.xyz</strong></a> and log in.</p><p style="text-align: start">Create a “non-ticketed” event in tokenproof. (In tokenproof’s terminology, “non-ticketed” means any event created outside of tokenproof.)</p><figure float="none" width="394px" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: 394px;"><img src="/images/blog/tokenproof-and-unlock-labs-bring-events-onchain-together/130f64b0723b688640b1525084b49386.png" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure><p>Then, choose the network your smart contract is on, and select “Add manual token” in the tokenproof event builder.</p><figure float="none" width="609px" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: 609px;"><img src="/images/blog/tokenproof-and-unlock-labs-bring-events-onchain-together/fec6c6fad126f73e5dc585615299c556.png" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure><p>Then, put in the details about the smart contract, including the blockchain and contract address you copied earlier.</p><figure float="none" width="356px" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: 356px;"><img src="/images/blog/tokenproof-and-unlock-labs-bring-events-onchain-together/87c1954e23f904ec5c83a99c605abb5c.png" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure><p>Fill the the rest of the details around the event, and you can claim victory! At this point, the Unlock-ticketed event can be checked in using the tokenproof verifier. You can <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://docs.tokenproof.xyz/documentation/for-verifiers/how-to-guides/verifier-app/scanning-wallets"><strong>learn more about the tokenproof verifier app here</strong></a>.</p><figure float="none" width="616px" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: 616px;"><img src="/images/blog/tokenproof-and-unlock-labs-bring-events-onchain-together/ea89e7980248da815c0478a3b250b18a.png" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure><p>The team at Unlock Labs had a blast connecting with the tokenproof team on this initiative and are looking forward to doing much more together throughout the rest of the event season!</p>
